name: Triple Hell
description:
CAN YOU ESCAPE BEFORE THEY KILL YOU?
(A proudly Pinoy Horror Game)

Triple Hell is a single player horror-themed game where you get to explore a creepy place that is believed to be inhabited by not just one, but several dark entities. The objective is for you to escape before the dark entities find you.

WARNING!
"You may find this game a bit difficult, but maybe give it a try."

STORY: 

You woke up in an unfamiliar place and you could not remember anything. You wanted to find out how you ended up there. However, everything was locked and you need to find a way out. Then suddenly, you noticed you are not alone. How fast can you escape and will you make it alive?

NOTE:

THIS GAME IS CURRENTLY AT EARLY ACCESS STAGE! SO THERE WILL BE MORE UPDATES COMING SOON!

- The game is 100% FREE TO DOWNLOAD. If you would like to donate, I would greatly appreciate it a lot. The donations I will receive will be spent to my game development resources. I would like to send in advance my big thanks to all those who supported this game. Some of you may noticed or some game reviewers have mentioned that the game has the exact or similar map of Outlast. Well the game is inspired by it, but the map isn't exactly the same.

SPEEDRUNNERS RECORDS

RodayaiHARD MODE2 mins 40 secs

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

Minimum System: 

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system 
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 64 bit
Processor: Ryzen 3 2200g / Intel Core i3
Ram: 2 GB ram
Video card: 1GB NVIDIA GTX 460 / ATI Radeon HD 6850 or better
DirectX: Version 11
Network: Broadband Internet connection
Disk Storage: 800 MB 

Recommended System:

Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
OS: Windows 7,8,10
Processor: Ryzen 3 3200g / Intel Core i5
Ram: 4 GB ram
Video card: 2GB NVIDIA GTX 970 /AMD Radeon RX 470 2gb or greater
DirectX: Version 11
Network: Broadband Internet connection
Disk Storage: 800 MB

I WILL UPDATE THIS GAME CONSTANTLY! --> Check out for more updates
